pages.text: Dinosaur DNA is obtained by processing amber in the DNA Extractor. Quality and species may vary.
DNA can be refined using the DNA Enhancer. Mixing compatible fragments can improve genetic quality.
Use a Cultivator to transform refined DNA and a Syntetic Egg into a Viable Dinosaur Egg.
To begin hybridizing, you will need two DNA samples, the system combine them into a viable genome if compatible.
